definitions: The action of stopping or causing to stop making progress.
The action of deliberately delaying or obstructing something.
The action of an engine or vehicle stopping because of an inadequate supply of power or fuel.
The action of an aircraft losing lift and beginning to fall.
examples: The government is stalling on the new legislation.
The car kept stalling at intersections.
The pilot was worried about the plane stalling.
He was accused of stalling for time.
